function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor recording of patients' ethnicity and race in health data","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of health determinants and potential exacerbation of racial biases","Mitigation":"Improving recording structures and reporting standards for ethnicity and race in health data","Technologies":"Data management systems with improved ethnicity and race recording features","People":"Marginalized populations","Owner":"Healthcare organizations and regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Lack of data sharing in COVID-19 research","Impact":"Limited ability to generate meaningful insights and solutions for the pandemic","Mitigation":"Establishing data sharing protocols and platforms for COVID-19 research","Technologies":"Data sharing platforms and collaboration tools","People":"General public and researchers","Owner":"Research institutions and government agencies"}]}
